title: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g. the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When I open the Help view, it does not allow immediate keyboard navigation.
EB: The Help view should be starting in a way that allows immediate keyboard navigation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Help view. 
2. Attempt to navigate using the keyboard without clicking on any 'live' areas. 
3. Observe that navigation does not work until a 'live' area is clicked.
